blanksigns.config.title: Blank Signs Config
blanksigns.modEnabled.label: Skip the edit screen when placing signs while sneaking
blanksigns.commands.reload: Blank Signs config reloaded. Current state: %s.
blanksigns.commands.enable.server: Blank Signs mod enabled. Players can now skip the sign edit screen.
blanksigns.commands.disable.server: Blank Signs mod disabled. Players can no longer skip the sign edit screen.
